entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain. Localised downpours possible. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria, especially about the ranges. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: Chance of upgrade to Warning has been reduced to low.
